name: TUBBYTRONIC SUPERDOME
description:
A mind that can't remember. A mouth that can't speak. A body that isn't yours. Welcome to the TUBBYTRONIC SUPERDOME.

~15min playtime.

Recommended listening while playing (Rockabye Baby covers of Red Hot Chili Peppers, Spotify link): https://open.spotify.com/album/4Fck4epvhHLWVUwH5UoGad?si=H-cxjTk6QX6USggfqFKC3A .

Any donations ("support this game" link) will be split between Pittsburgh Mutual Aid and Jailbreak.

https://www.pittsburghmutualaid.com/pittsburgh-mutual-aid

https://jailbreakpgh.org/
